results.title: Simvastatin-induced lupus erythematosus.
results.text_hl: We report the case of a 79-year-old man who had onset of @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgia@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@pleuritic chest pain@@@ 3 months after initiation of therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: [The effect of hypolipemic therapy with diet and simvastatin on the course of angina pectoris and the results of exercise stress test in patients with coronary artery disease].
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@PATIENTS@@@ AND METHODS: We studied 44 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with typical anginal @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@. In all blood sampling and treadmill stress test were made, and next in all hypolipemic diet and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg were recommended.

results.title: Reduction of C-reactive protein by a single 80 mg of simvastatin in patients with unstable angina.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Forty-two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with rest @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ were randomly assigned to a single placebo or 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ given at the time of admission plus standard therapy.

results.title: Atypical presentation of a middle age male with severe hypertriglyceridaemia: a case report
results.text_hl: Here we describe a case of 53-year-old white male admitted to the emergency room with acute atypical central @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ of 8 hours duration.
